顶级会议

一些相关的顶级会议，平时看以NIPS和ICML为主

机器学习：

  • NIPS Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems

  • ICML International Conference on Machine Learning

  • COLT Annual Conference on Computational Learning Theory 偏理论

  • ECMLEuropean Conference on Machine Learning and Principles

数据挖掘

  • SIGKDD ACM Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining 会议主页http://www.sigkdd.org/。

  • SDM SIAM International Conference on Data Mining

  • ICDM International Conference on Data Mining

机器学习与数据挖掘大杂烩

  • IJCAI International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence

  • AAAI AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence

数据库

  • SIGMOD ACM Conference on Management of Data 会议主页http://www.acm.org/sigmod/。

  • VLDB International Conference on Very Large Data Bases 会议主页http://www.vldb.org/。

  • ICDE IEEE International Conference on Data Engineering

信息检索

  • SIGIR International Conference on Research on Development in Information Retrieval

一些在线资源：

  • http://www.kdnuggets.com

  • http://www.chinakdd.com/

网址集合 http://www.dmoz.org/Computers/Software/Databases/Data_Mining// A google co-op search engine for Data Mining

http://www.google.com/coop/cse?cx=006422944775554126616:ixcd3tdxkke Data Mining, University of Houston

http://nas.cl.uh.edu/boetticher/CSCI5931 Data Mining.html Data Mining Program, University of Central Florida http://dms.stat.ucf.edu/ Data Mining Group, University of Dortmund http://www-ai.cs.uni-dortmund.de/index.html Data Mining, MIT OCW

http://ocw.mit.edu/OcwWeb/Sloan-School-of-Management/15-062Data-MiningSpring2003/CourseHome/ Data Mining Group, Tsinghua http://dbgroup.cs.tsinghua.edu.cn/dmg.html KDD oral presentations video http://www.videolectures.net

Tools Weka http://www.cs.waikato.ac.nz/ml/weka/ Rapid Miner(Yale) http://rapid-i.com/content/view/3/76/lang,en/ IlliMine http://illimine.cs.uiuc.edu/ Alpha Miner http://www.eti.hku.hk/alphaminer Potter’s Wheel A-B-C http://control.cs.berkeley.edu/abc/
